quote: “Time magnifies the margin between success and failure. It will multiply whatever you feed it. Good habits make time your ally. Bad habits make time your enemy.”
author: James Clear
comments: A good habit, over a long period of time, will have an incredible effect. Many authors write books by writing only a few hours per day. Athletes may train only a few days per week. This quote connects the value of time with your habits in a stark way.
